about_the_game:
With a Legendary Pack, the world of Albion is yours for the taking. Dive headlong into your adventure with exclusive mounts, gear, and avatars, plus 10,000 Gold and 60 extra days of Premium Status. Tear through the open world on your Legendary Horse mount, or transport tons of goods and resources with the Legendary Cart. And with two exclusive armor sets and multiple avatars, you'll start your adventure in Albion in style.

The Legendary Pack includes:
  • 60 Additional Days of Premium Status
  • 10,000 Gold
  • Exclusive Legendary Avatars
  • Exclusive Epic Avatars
  • Exclusive Legendary Armor (hat, tunic, boots and cape)
  • Exclusive Epic Armor (hat, tunic, and boots)
  • Exclusive Legendary Horse
  • Exclusive Legendary Cart

Note: as with all items in the game, the items included in this pack are lootable and destructible. Store them in a chest until you're ready to use them!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 - 18.04 LTS 64 bit or SteamOS (other distributions may work, but are not officially supported)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: SDL2: libsdl2-2.0-0
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 - 18.04 LTS 64 bit or SteamOS (other distributions may work, but are not officially supported)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: SDL2: libsdl2-2.0-0
